description: Denominators of greedy Egyptian fraction for e - 2.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Egyptian Fraction
Index entries for sequences related to Egyptian fractions
formula: a(n) = ceiling(1/(e - 2 - sum_{j=0..n-1} 1/a(j))). - _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Dec 26 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
